    <div id="guide_header_title">
     <h1>
      <span class="guidetitle">
       The Detective in Film and Literature &nbsp;
      </span>
     </h1>
    </div>

     <span id="lastupdate" class="lastupdate">

    <div id="content">
     <div id="contentleft" style="width:230px;">
      <div id="leftboxes">
       <div id="wrapbox20577094">
        <div class="roundbox outerbox" id="20577094">
         <div class="roundbox headerbox" id="title20577094">
          <div class="bi_links">
           &nbsp;
          </div>
          <h2>
           Need help with your research?
          </h2>
         </div>
         <div class="roundbox innerbox innerbox_3" id="content20577094">
          <p>
          </p>
          <p>
           Contact:
          </p>
          <p>
           Kelly Cannon
           <br />
           Humanities &amp; Business Librarian
           <br />
           phone: x3602
           <br />
           email: kcannon@muhlenberg.edu
           <br />
           IM (AIM, Yahoo): refcannon
          </p>
          <p>
           <a href="http://bit.ly/spring2015student">
            A.T.
           </a>
          </p>
          <div id="boxatt20577094" class="boxatt">
           <div class="itemlist">
            <ul>

            &nbsp;&nbsp;
           </div>
          </div>
         </div>
        </div>
       </div>
      </div>
     </div>
     <div id="contentcenter" style="width:520px;padding-left:0px; margin-left:0px; margin-right:8px; float:left;">
      <div id="centerboxes">
       <div id="wrapbox20577095">
        <div class="roundbox outerbox" id="20577095">
         <div class="roundbox headerbox" id="title20577095">
          <div class="bi_links">
           &nbsp;
          </div>
          <h2>
           Where can I get topic ideas and a bibliography of recommended sources?
          </h2>
         </div>
         <div class="roundbox innerbox innerbox_3" id="content20577095">
          <div id="boxatt20577095" class="boxatt">
           <div class="itemlist">
            <ul>
             <li id="link23999171">
              <a id="link_23999171" href="http://muhlenberg.idm.oclc.org/login?url=http://search.credoreference.com" target="_blank" onclick="hit(23999171,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'The Detective in Film and Literature', 'page_name' : 'Home'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 18508858}); ">
               Credo Reference
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               Hundreds of authoritative dictionaries, encyclopedias, fact books, guides, companions and more from respected publishers across dozens of major subject areas.
              </div>
             </li>
             <li id="link24047225">
              <a id="link_24047225" href="https://muhlenberg.idm.oclc.org/login?url=http://link.springer.com/10.1007/978-1-4614-5690-2" target="_blank" onclick="hit(24047225,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'The Detective in Film and Literature', 'page_name' : 'Home'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 24047225}); ">
               Encyclopedia of Criminology and Criminal Justice
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               The Encyclopedia of Criminology and Criminal Justice is an international, comprehensive reference tool for the field of Criminology and Criminal Justice that is both cutting edge as well as of very high scientific quality and prestige. This 10-volume work provides a complete and systematic coverage of the field that is unprecedented. The Encyclopedia "defines the field" through its choice of organization and entries. It identifies and brings emerging ideas and trends to the forefront. The Encyclopedia covers Criminology and Criminal Justice in ten broad areas, with leading researchers writing substantive contributions within their area of expertise.
              </div>
             </li>
             <li id="link23999169">
              <a id="link_23999169" href="http://muhlenberg.idm.oclc.org/login?url=http://find.galegroup.com/openurl/openurl?url_ver=Z39.88-2004&amp;url_ctx_fmt=info:ofi/fmt:kev:mtx:ctx&amp;req_dat=info:sid/gale:ugnid:mul_coll&amp;res_id=info:sid/gale:GVRL&amp;ctx_enc=info:ofi:enc:UTF-8&amp;rft_val_fmt=info:ofi/fmt:kev:mtx:book&amp;rft_id=info:sid/gale:bmcode:recid/5IXM" target="_blank" onclick="hit(23999169,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'The Detective in Film and Literature', 'page_name' : 'Home'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 23466487}); ">
               Schirmer Encyclopedia of Film
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               This reference provides a comprehensive and accessible introduction to film and film studies, covering such aspects as production, national traditions, studios, genres, critical theory and film history.
              </div>
             </li>
            </ul>
           </div>
          </div>
         </div>
        </div>
       </div>
       <div id="wrapbox20577097">
        <div class="roundbox outerbox" id="20577097">
         <div class="roundbox headerbox" id="title20577097">
          <div class="bi_links">
           &nbsp;
          </div>
          <h2>
           How do I find scholarly books, chapters, and journal articles?
          </h2>
         </div>
         <div class="roundbox innerbox innerbox_3" id="content20577097">
          <div id="boxatt20577097" class="boxatt">
           <div class="itemlist">
            <ul>
             <li id="link23999207">
              <a id="link_23999207" href="https://muhlenberg.idm.oclc.org/login?url=http://search.ebscohost.com/login.asp?profile=ehost&amp;defaultdb=a9h" target="_blank" onclick="hit(23999207,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'The Detective in Film and Literature', 'page_name' : 'Home'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 12343584}); ">
               Academic Search Complete
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               Full text access to scholarly and non-scholarly publications in a wide variety of disciplines and subject areas.
              </div>
             </li>
             <li id="link23999200">
              <a id="link_23999200" href="http://muhlenberg.on.worldcat.org/advancedsearch" target="_blank" onclick="hit(23999200,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'The Detective in Film and Literature', 'page_name' : 'Home'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 18508793}); ">
               Encompass Search
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               Encompass Search searches for books and other resources, first in our own library, and then beyond, in other research libraries.
              </div>
             </li>
             <li id="link24001295">
              <a id="link_24001295" href="http://books.google.com" target="_blank" onclick="hit(24001295,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'The Detective in Film and Literature', 'page_name' : 'Home'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 18508825}); ">
               Google Books
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               Google Books is a rich source of full-text documents (books and other materials) published prior to 1923 that are now in the public domain.
              </div>
             </li>
             <li id="link23999099">
              <a id="link_23999099" href="http://scholar.google.com/" target="_blank" onclick="hit(23999099,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'The Detective in Film and Literature', 'page_name' : 'Home'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 19974037}); ">
               Google Scholar
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               May be used in conjunction with interlibrary loan. Access to full text is maximized by searching from the Muhlenberg network.
              </div>
             </li>
             <li id="link24000115">
              <a id="link_24000115" href="https://muhlenberg.idm.oclc.org/login?url=http://www.jstor.org/" target="_blank" onclick="hit(24000115,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'The Detective in Film and Literature', 'page_name' : 'Home'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 12717122}); ">
               JSTOR
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               Full text of scholarly journals from most academic disciplines. Coverage is from the inception of the journal through three to five years ago. Current issues are often to be found in Project Muse (see below). Includes nearly 300 journals specific to language and literature, including American Literary History, American Quarterly, Chaucer Review, College Composition and Communication, College English, College Literature, Early American Literature, ELH, English Journal, New Literary History, Shakespeare Quarterly, Southern Literary Journal, and Yearbook of English Studies.
              </div>
             </li>
             <li id="link23999196">
              <a id="link_23999196" href="https://muhlenberg.idm.oclc.org/login?url=http://search.ebscohost.com/login.asp?profile=web&amp;defaultdb=mzh" target="_blank" onclick="hit(23999196,'links','1', {'link_obj' : this, 'guide_name' : 'The Detective in Film and Literature', 'page_name' : 'Home'}); return SpringTrack.trackLink(this, {st_type : TRACKING_TYPE_LINK, link_id: 12766286}); ">
               MLA International Bibliography
              </a>
              <div class="linkdesc">
               Premier scholarly index, with numerous links to full text, to criticism in the areas of literature, language, linguistics, film studies, and folklore, published from 1920-present.
              </div>
             </li>
            </ul>
           </div>
          </div>
         </div>
        </div>
       </div>
      </div>
     </div>
     <div id="contentright" style="width:209px;float:left; padding-right:0px;">
      <div id="profile5493160" class="profile_wrapper">
      </div>
      <div id="rightboxes">
       <div id="wrapbox20577098">
        <div class="roundbox outerbox" id="20577098">
         <div class="roundbox headerbox" id="title20577098">
          <div class="bi_links">
           &nbsp;
          </div>
          <h2>
           Citing sources
          </h2>
         </div>
         <div class="roundbox innerbox innerbox_3" id="content20577098">
          <p>
           For tips on citing print and electronic sources, visit
           <a href="http://trexler.muhlenberg.edu/research/citation-guides.html">
            Trexler Library's
            <em>
             Citation Guides for Print and Electronic Resources
            </em>
           </a>
           .
          </p>
          <p>
           For automated citation, try the shareware
           <a href="http://www.zotero.org/">
            <em>
             Zotero
            </em>
           </a>
           .
          </p>
          <p>
          </p>
          <div id="boxatt20577098" class="boxatt">
           <div class="itemlist">
            <ul>
            </ul>
            &nbsp;&nbsp;
           </div>
          </div>
         </div>
        </div>
       </div>
       <div id="wrapbox20577099">
        <div class="roundbox outerbox" id="20577099">
         <div class="roundbox headerbox" id="title20577099">
          <div class="bi_links">
           &nbsp;
          </div>
          <h2>
           Articles via interlibrary loan
          </h2>
         </div>
         <div class="roundbox innerbox innerbox_3" id="content20577099">
          <p>
           Journal articles not found in Trexler Library can be ordered on&nbsp;
           <a href="http://trexler.muhlenberg.edu/services/interlibrary-loan.html">
            interlibrary loan
           </a>
           .
          </p>
          <div id="boxatt20577099" class="boxatt">
           <div class="itemlist">
            <ul>
            </ul>
            &nbsp;&nbsp;
           </div>
          </div>
         </div>
        </div>
       </div>

     <div id="descpopuptitle" class="balloon_head">
      <h6>
       Description
      </h6>
     </div>
     <div class="balloon_body" id="descpopupcontent">
      <p>
       <img alt="Loading" src="http://lgimages.s3.amazonaws.com/indicator.gif" />
       &nbsp; Loading...
      </p>
     </div>
    </div>
    <img alt="Tip" style="top:-200px; left:-500px;" id="tippointer" src="http://lgimages.s3.amazonaws.com/tippointer.gif" />
    <div id="popupinfo" class="popup" style="visibility: visible; top:-200px; left:-500px;">
     <div class="popup_head">
      <table align="right" border="0">
       <tr>
        <td valign="bottom" height="18">
         <a href="#" onclick="return hideAlert('popupinfo')">
          <img alt="Close" src="http://lgimages.s3.amazonaws.com/window_close_grey.gif" border="0" align="absbottom" />
         </a>
        </td>
       </tr>
      </table>
      <div id="popupinfotitle" style="display:inline;">
       <h6>
        More Information
       </h6>
      </div>
     </div>
     <div class="popup_body">
      <div id="popupinfocontent" style="display:inline;">
       <img alt="Loading" src="http://lgimages.s3.amazonaws.com/indicator.gif" />
       &nbsp; Loading...
      </div>
      <br />
      <center>
       <a href="#" onclick="hideAlert('popupinfo'); return false;">
        Close
       </a>
      </center>
     </div>
    </div>
   </div>
  </div>
  <div id="dp" style="width:850px;">
   &nbsp;
  </div>

   cssdropdown.startchrome("tabs12");
  </script>

                        st_type : content_config.hitsource,
